|  [valuesToBuffers(values)](./sdk-core.argserializer.valuestobuffers.md) |  | Serializes a set of typed values into a set of strings buffers. Variadic types and composite types might result into none, one or more buffers. |
|  [valuesToString(values)](./sdk-core.argserializer.valuestostring.md) |  | Serializes a set of typed values into an arguments string (e.g. aa<!-- -->@<!-- -->bb<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->cc). |
